itunes:title: This Is the Church Week 1 with Jessica Lamb
title: This Is the Church Week 1 with Jessica Lamb
description:
This week, Raechel and Amanda kick off Week 1 of This Is the Church with She Reads Truth’s editorial director Jessica Lamb. As they lay the groundwork for understanding who and what the Church is, they explore different passages in Scripture that address what it means to be a community of believers. Tune in as they  talk about the person and work of Jesus and what it means to live out the gospel as the people of God.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Church reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the This Is the Church collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-church-week-1-with-jessica-lamb.
